rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with a private attached bathroom, keeping in line with Vastu to enhance prosperity and health.
Second bedroom for family members designed according to traditional Kerala style, ensuring comfort without clashing with Vastu principles.
Third bedroom focusing on natural light and air flow through large windows, promoting health and well-being.
A designated room for servants with a small attached bathroom to ensure privacy and convenience within the joint family structure.
An open-plan kitchen designed for easy movement, equipped with modern appliances while respecting traditional cooking spaces.
A large living area connected to the kitchen for an open-plan setup. The space is designed to promote family bonding and gatherings, adhering to Vastu principles.
A separate dining area adjacent to the kitchen ensuring convenience for meal preparation and serving.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Primary entrance aligned with Vastu principles to allow positive energy flow into the home.

openings.name: Living Room Windows
openings.location: All sides except South-East, aligning with natural light and air flow preferences.
openings.description: Strategically placed windows in the living room to enhance ventilation and allow ample sunlight, keeping in line with traditional Kerala architecture.
